projects.title: Factory Predictive Maintenance Rollout
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Deploy sensor-driven predictive maintenance across two flagship assembly plants to cut unplanned downtime and improve throughput reliability.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Install sensor kits on critical presses and paint lines
- [ ] Build fault-risk dashboard for plant supervisors
- [ ] Train maintenance teams on predictive workflows

projects.title: Battery Supply Risk Hedging Program
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Diversify battery cell sourcing and add contractual risk controls to protect EV launch timelines from commodity and geopolitical volatility.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Finalize dual-source supplier framework
- [ ] Establish monthly risk heatmap with scenario triggers
- [ ] Negotiate indexed pricing guardrails

projects.title: Dealer Portal UX Refresh
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Modernize dealer workflows for inventory lookup and incentive visibility with minimal architectural changes.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Consolidate key workflows into a single dashboard
- [ ] Reduce lead capture steps from five to three
- [ ] Add context-aware help prompts

projects.title: Legacy Warranty Mainframe Rewrite
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Replace the legacy warranty claims mainframe with a service-oriented platform to reduce long-term technical debt and support future automation.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Define target-state domain model and APIs
- [ ] Migrate historical claims data in staged waves
- [ ] Parallel-run old and new platforms for one quarter

projects.title: Enhanced Warranty Turnaround Visibility
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Improving warranty turnaround visibility is essential for both customers and dealers, especially in light of the unpredictable supply chain. This initiative will help manage expectations and enhance the overall customer experience, which is vital for brand reputation.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Create a real-time warranty status dashboard
- [ ] Integrate dealer and customer-facing interfaces
- [ ] Establish regular updates for stakeholders
- [ ] Develop a communication plan for transparency

projects.title: One Source of Truth for Claim Status
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Dealers are losing valuable time chasing answers due to fragmented systems. Creating a unified interface for claim status will streamline operations, reduce confusion, and improve dealer satisfaction, which is crucial for maintaining strong dealer relationships.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Design a centralized claims status portal
- [ ] Integrate existing systems into the new portal
- [ ] Develop user training materials for dealers
- [ ] Launch a pilot program with select dealers

projects.title: Proactive Component Failure Risk Management
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Unexpected stoppages during paint-line changeovers are causing significant delays. By implementing a proactive risk management system for component failures, we can minimize downtime and improve overall throughput, which is essential for meeting production targets.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Develop a predictive maintenance system for components
- [ ] Train technicians on risk assessment protocols
- [ ] Implement real-time monitoring tools
- [ ] Establish a reporting framework for failure risks

projects.title: Supply Chain Risk Management Framework
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
With single-source battery contracts posing a board-level risk, establishing a formal risk management framework is critical. This initiative will help mitigate supply chain disruptions and ensure continuity in production, which is vital for meeting customer demand.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Identify and evaluate backup suppliers
- [ ] Develop formal risk triggers for supply chain events
- [ ] Create a risk management communication plan
- [ ] Establish regular review checkpoints for risk status

projects.title: Warranty Claims Workflow Improvement
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
The current manual processes for warranty claim handoffs between dealers and central support lead to customer frustration and inefficiencies. By modernizing the claims workflow, we can enhance transparency, reduce rework, and improve customer satisfaction, which is critical for maintaining trust and loyalty.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Develop a digital claims management system
- [ ] Implement consistent triage rules for escalations
- [ ] Train staff on new workflow processes
- [ ] Establish clear ownership protocols for claims

projects.title: Weekend Staffing and Alert Optimization
projects.body:
# Executive Summary
Thin staffing during weekend shifts leads to operational inefficiencies and delays. By optimizing alerts and prioritizing actionable information, we can ensure that technicians are better equipped to handle issues as they arise, thus improving overall productivity.

## Deliverables
- [ ] Develop a prioritized alert system for weekend shifts
- [ ] Create a staffing plan that aligns with alert triggers
- [ ] Train staff on new alert protocols
- [ ] Monitor and adjust alert effectiveness post-implementation

updates.author: Program Management Office
updates.body:
# Weekly Rollup

Key achievements this week include progress on the Factory Predictive Maintenance rollout and alignment on the Dealer Portal UX refresh scope.

## Highlights

- **PRJ-001**: Sensor installation 40% complete at Plant A; dashboard prototype reviewed.
- **PRJ-003**: Consolidated workflow designs approved by Sales leadership.

## Next Week

- Begin pilot for predictive fault alerts.
- Dealer Portal: start development sprint one.

updates.author: Program Management Office
updates.body:
# Weekly Rollup

Battery supply hedging negotiations advanced; predictive maintenance pilot kicked off.

## Highlights

- **PRJ-002**: Dual-source framework draft shared with legal.
- **PRJ-001**: First sensor batch installed; baseline data collection started.
